snippet: GitHire, a new source for technology-industry hiring in the Bay Area, promises the names of five great programmers for $1,000, but there are only so many people in this field around.
lead_paragraph: GitHire, a new source for technology-industry hiring in the Bay Area, promises the names of five great programmers for $1,000, but there are only so many people in this field around.

headline.seo: GitHire, a Headhunter, Is Swamped After Promising 5 Hire-Worthy Bay Area Programmers for $1,000
headline.main: A New Resource for Hiring Programmers Has Become Entirely Too Successful
headline.print_headline: A New Resource for Hiring Programmers Has Become Entirely Too Successful
